评论详情: Shipped fast, arrived in colorful pouch. I was excited by how pretty this item is.  I measured my wrist as directed and ordered the 6.5" but it was actually much closer to 6" and I couldn't even get it to latch on my wrist it was so small. Very disappointing.

I love this watchband style of bracelet. I had one from Zara that I wore for years but unfortunately it finally broke and was unfixable. I was thrilled to give this one from Electric Picks a try. I’m a female with a 6” wrist and I ordered this in the smaller size. The fit is perfect. I’ve been wearing this for at least 5 days straight now, only removing to bathe. I removed one star because the gold tone is much darker in person than shown in image description. I was worried this would be a dealbreaker, but I’ve grown to love it - but still felt it worth mentioning. I was also not crazy about the brand logo on the clasp, but turns out it’s really difficult to see unless viewing up close. I found a lot more info about this brand Electric Picks from their retail website. The company started from stringing (vintage) guitar picks onto a bracelet, which as a guitar musician, I thought was really neat. I received this through Amazon Vine at a discounted price in exchange for my review, but feel the full price is fair - it’s would I’d expect to pay for a good quality gold plated piece. Electric Picks doesn’t have a store here on Amazon, but after doing a search for them, there are some really cool pieces available for sale including a bezel tennis bracelet I love. I do recommend this bracelet, but keeping in mind the gold plating does run dark.

Love this bracelet- size is perfect and the design is really elegant, stylish, well-done and looks like a fantastic dupe for a designer bracelet. The gold tone looks great. Feels comfortable on wrist at same time substantial. Would totally recommend if you like the style! This brand, "Electric picks" so far has never let me so would also recommend checking out more of their designs as well.

评论概述: Fit perfectly, beautiful, looking, very comfortable on
评论详情: I’m actually shocked how much I love this new bracelet! I have a 6 1/2 inch wrist and ordered the size 6 1/2. This fits me no problem and I actually have just the tiniest little bit of room on my wrist, so it’s not skin tight either. The gold is a beautiful shade. It’s not too brassy or orange. This is extremely comfortable on with the shiny curved links side up and more of a matte flat look on the inside that is against your skin. Although a tiny bit difficult to put on and take off by myself, it can be done. Great price point, very nice looking, definitely recommend!

I ordered the 6.5" version which fits very closely at the smallest area of my wrist. I do have very small wrist and although this is not uncomfortable on, I do wish I would of went up to the 7" for a little wiggle room. The quality is very good, and the gold is not too dark or have a brassy look.

Very impressed with this piece, nice thickness, made well, size is perfect with just enough room to spare. Really nice weight to it, looks really good. Attention to detail is amazing, with the brand initials on the clasp. I’m impressed, & packaging is cute.

This Electric Picks 14kt Gold Plated Bracelet is just what I needed to elevate my jewelry game! The 10mm width gives it a bold, stylish look, and the 6.5” size fits perfectly on my wrist. I appreciate the quality—durable, with a beautiful shine that hasn’t faded. Whether dressed up or down, it’s a versatile piece that instantly adds sophistication to any outfit!

This is a stainless steel bracelet that has been plated with 14K yellow gold.  The quality is good, and even though it has a watch-band type design appeal, it is very nice.  This is a bracelet for those who prefer a minimalist style, and it has a 6.5" sizing that fits smaller wrists.  The bracelet comes in an iridescent bag and would make a nice gift.

This little bracelet has some weight to it! It has a sturdy clasp, a beautiful shine to the gold and hasn’t tarnished! I loved that they have 6.5” options for smaller wrists because the 6.5” fits beautifully! It glides on the wrist well, doesn’t pull arm hair and is a beautiful accessory. I’ve worn it daily for about 2 weeks now and it hasn’t gotten dull or green! This one is a win!!!!!!!

This is a nice, high quality gold plated bracelet. My daughter says it feels nice when she wears it and she loves the way it looks. The clasp is effective and very secure. Even though my daughter has a small wrist, she does say the 6.5 size is a little tight, and she would probably prefer the seven size.

评论概述: Very Pretty!  Very Clean and Simple Design!
评论详情: I love this bracelet! I always shop early for birthdays and other celebrations, and this bracelet will be the perfect gift for my "minimalist" daughter. Her birthday is not until June, but I could not let this beautiful bracelet go!  The bracelet is lightweight because it is 14K gold-plated over stainless steel. However, it is sturdy and durable and will resist tarnishing. I looked at similar bracelets, and this one compares favorably in quality and price!
